modShortDescription: This is Alsep Island and Atrum Island Morggin's 12k x 12k maps Generated with NitroGen v0501. Both of the maps use just the standard spawns.
modDescription:
This is Alsep Island and Atrum Island Morgginâ€™s 12k x 12k maps Generated with [NitroGen](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/12730-a19-nitrogen-a-random-world-generator-for-7dtd/) v0501\. Both of the [maps](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-maps/) use just the standard spawns (not Combo pack). They are both working on Alpha 19.3 (b6) Stable. Feel free to download and use on your private/public server. A preview map can be found inside each zip as well.

* **Alsep Island** is his original map.
* **Atrum Island** has had the Height Map adjust a bit for deeper water, island adjustments and additions then rotated and flipped. It has all new roads and towns generated after the adjustments. _(Atrum Island is now currently running on his public server.)_
* **Atrum\_HM\_BIOM:** This is the Import\_HM.png and the biomes.png needed to generate the map to incorporate the Combo Packs if you so wish.
* **Atrum Island-Burnt** has craters/wasteland/burned areas added. It has all new roads and towns generated after the adjustments.
* **Wasteland\_Crater\_Biome for Alsep Island 12K x 12K:** Replace the biomes.png in your Alsep Island map folder to add craters/wasteland/burned areas to your map.
* **Wasteland\_Crater\_Biome for Atrum Island 12K x 12K:** Replace the biomes.png in your Atrum Island map folder to add craters/wasteland/burned areas to your map.

**[Download](https://atrumorbis.net/exhumed/Alsep%20Island.zip)** Alsep Island  
**[Download](https://atrumorbis.net/exhumed/Atrum%20Island.zip)** Atrum Island  
**[Download](https://atrumorbis.net/exhumed/Atrum_HM_BIOM.zip)** Atrum\_HM\_BIOM  
**[Download](https://atrumorbis.net/exhumed/AtrumIsland-Burnt.zip)** Atrum Island-Burnt  
**[Download](https://atrumorbis.net/exhumed/Wasteland_Crater_Biome_Alsep.zip)** Wasteland\_Crater\_Biome for Alsep Island 12K x 12K  
**[Download](https://atrumorbis.net/exhumed/Wasteland_Crater_Biome_Atrum.zip)** Wasteland\_Crater\_Biome for Atrum Island 12K x 12K

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21107-alsep-atrum-islands-alpha-19-maps/).

**Credits:** Morggin
